task_description:
# Improved Region Detection for Complex Layouts

Enhance region detection algorithms to handle complex puzzle layouts with irregular shapes, overlapping colors, and non-standard grid patterns.

## Rationale
Region detection is imperfect on complex layouts, causing frustration for users with challenging puzzles - exactly when they need help most. This addresses the known gap in grid dimension estimation for irregular layouts.

## User Stories
- As a user with a complex puzzle, I want the app to correctly identify all regions so that I can get help on the hardest puzzles
- As a mobile user, I want region detection to work even with slight image distortions from camera angles

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Region contours correctly identified for 85%+ of puzzles
- [ ] Color segmentation handles gradients and similar colors
- [ ] Grid dimensions accurately estimated for irregular layouts
- [ ] Fallback strategies when primary detection fails
